snippet.title: Cold and Afraid - Official Reveal Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Here's your look at Cold and Afraid in this reveal trailer for the PS1-styled crime/mystery where you play a detective in a race against the clock to apprehend a killer who's begun terrorizing the people of an upstate borough. Cold and Afraid will be available on PC in Q4 2025.
